definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: The candidates all pandered to Michigan's biggest special interest.
sentences.chinese: 所有的競選者都圍繞密西根最大的利益焦點極力逢迎。

sentences.english: So this is Michigan over here.
The state of Michigan already had an agricultural college .
sentences.chinese: 密西根州已有一所農學院。

sentences.english: Kevorkian expects his prices to be competitive with AOL.
sentences.chinese: 密西根州其價格預計將與美國線上競爭。

sentences.english: Saying he's in New York but not Michigan doesn't seem very attractive.
sentences.chinese: 說他在紐約而不在密西根，似乎也不具吸引力。

sentences.english: It's the Michigan fellow who's Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: 密西根傢伙纔是拿破崙。

sentences.english: Larry served as an electrican in the theater of Michigan University nearby.
sentences.chinese: 拉瑞在附近的密西根大學的劇場當電工。

sentences.english: And he wakes up in Michigan.
My aunt used to live in this part of Michigan that was kind of out in the country.
sentences.chinese: 我姑媽曾住在這個國家中密西根州的一個地區。

sentences.english: Just like it wasn't a crazy thing to say if we only had the guy in Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 同理，如果只有這個密西根傢伙，那麼也不算瘋狂。

sentences.english: What am I doing in Michigan?
CloudAV was developed at the University of Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 抗病毒雲是由密西根大學研發的。

sentences.english: But how could it possibly turn on what's happening in Michigan?
sentences.chinese: 但怎麼可能依賴於在密西根發生了什麼？

sentences.english: You see, that man paints the inside of the Mackinac Bridge towers in Northern Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 你看，那個人正在油漆北密西根的麥克南克橋的內部。

sentences.english: One of the most famous of these camps is the Interlochen Centre for the Arts in Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 其中最著名的營地之一是密西根州的湖心藝術中心。

definition: Lake Michigan, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
British Columbia, Pacific province of Canada
pinyin: Ying1 shu3 Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4
